community_descriptions.description: When things get hairy, you don't stick around to be the hero. You skedaddle like a pro—and look cool doing it.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: Why aim for one target when you can hit everyone in the room? Bonus points if it makes a satisfying 'ding!'
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: Fast, twitchy, and just a little bit annoying—just like you.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: Two shots are better than one. Unless you miss both. Then, you're just embarrassing.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: Guaranteed to deliver loud noises, flying debris, and existential dread straight to your enemy's doorstep.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: Why take the high ground when you can just slam everyone down to yours?
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: Turn the battlefield into a storm of metal and shrapnel. Good luck finding cover.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: More fury, more fire, more boom. Your therapist may have concerns, but your teammates won't.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: Burn them coming, burn them going, burn them everywhere. It's a lifestyle choice, really.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: When silence isn't enough, scream your fiery dominance to the heavens. They'll hear you… and smell you.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: Got a handful of fire and a bad attitude? Good. Let 'em have it.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: Who needs strategy when you can just blow up everything in sight at once?
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: It's not a party until something explodes, burns, or accidentally hits a teammate.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: It's like your lucky charm, except it explodes. A lot.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: Because the loudest solution is usually the right one.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: Not everyone gets bread. Some get a smashed face. It's called balance.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: Your buildings are your kingdom, and this is your iron fist.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: Shoot first, heal later. Wait, no—do both at once!
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: Sure, it's unsanitary. But so is dying.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: They won't follow in your footsteps—they'll burn in them.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: Silence is golden. Stabbing is platinum.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate

community_descriptions.description: It's not about the first shot—it's about the fact they never see the next one.
community_descriptions.author: CzechMate
